name: ARS Electronica #5 Dance for the Portal
description:
Video feedback piece for ARS Electronica 2021, Festival for Art, Technology, & Society
Garden NEW YORK CITY
8-12 Sept. 

Dance for the Portal was shot in an abandoned building in Chicago on an i phone 7. Playing with light and shadow, a dismebodied door and our bodies, we find magic in the mundane. 

Footage processed with a Tachyons + Vortex Decoder and rescanned from an RCA CRT monitor with the i phone 7.
